title: Proud Boys Leader Enrique Tarrio Arrested in Connection With Jan. 6 Attack
sub_head: Leader of right-wing group, who wasn’t present at U.S. Capitol during attack, is indicted on conspiracy charges
body:
WASHINGTON—Enrique Tarrio, a leader of the Proud Boys, has been indicted on conspiracy and other charges related to the Jan. 6 attack on the U.S. Capitol, the Justice Department said, alleging he developed plans with other members of the extremist group to storm the building that day.
Mr. Tarrio, 38 years old, was arrested in Miami and made a brief appearance Tuesday in federal court in Florida, where prosecutors described him as a danger to the community and said they would seek to extend his detention at a further hearing scheduled for Friday. A judge appointed a public defender after Mr. Tarrio said he had no savings outside of the roughly $400 he makes a week at a new job printing T-shirts.
